npc_encounter.image_prompt: A {style} scene in a mysterious forest where a {character} suddenly appears and starts {action}, {emotion} atmosphere, cinematic lighting
npc_encounter.text_template: 突然，{character}出现了！它开始{action}，场面十分{emotion}！

sudden_event.image_prompt: A {style} scene in a forest showing {action} happening unexpectedly, {emotion} mood, dramatic moment
sudden_event.text_template: 意外发生了！{action}突然出现，让人感到{emotion}！

rule_change.image_prompt: A {style} mystical forest scene with mysterious rules changing, {emotion} atmosphere, magical effects
rule_change.text_template: 森林的规则改变了！现在你必须{action}才能继续前进！

brave_forward.image_prompt: A {style} heroic scene in forest where character bravely {action}, {emotion} atmosphere, epic moment
brave_forward.text_template: 你鼓起勇气{action}，展现出了{emotion}的一面！

seek_help.image_prompt: A {style} scene where {character} appears to help, {emotion} atmosphere, hopeful lighting
seek_help.text_template: {character}听到了你的呼唤，前来{action}帮助你！

wise_choice.image_prompt: A {style} clever scene showing {action} with wisdom, {emotion} atmosphere, intelligent solution
wise_choice.text_template: 你运用智慧{action}，这个{emotion}的决定改变了局面！
